title: Patient Sitter Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Very fast and easy it was straight forward and very organized the managers were very nice and staff directed you without a problem it took about 2 weeks to begin working
Interview Questions: Why do I want to work here

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Applied in person and turned in documents needed. Not much of an interview. Make sure to check the date and time of orientation. The ladies that run the program are very nice.
Interview Questions: What do you plan on doing in the future?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: I had 3 rounds of interviews withing the nursing administration team. Each interview was 30 minutes in person. They also gave me a tour of the department/floor I would be working if given the job.

title: Financial Controller Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (Seattle, WA) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: Full day interview with multiple teams and departments. Casual environment with some specific questions, but more of discussion type interview. Long day, but overall it was a great interview and experience.
Interview Questions: What could you bring to the table?

title: Customer Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (Marrero, LA) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: I met with the manager of the department. She gave me a description of the things I will be doing in the job position along with starting pay. She also gave me a tour of the department. She definitely made the interview process easy and comfortable for me.
Interview Questions: Name a time when you had to go over and beyond to help meet the needs of a customer.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Had a call for a face to face interview two days after applying to the job. Was told HR would reach out with the official offer of employment. Was introduced to department heads and shown the system that I would be working in.
Interview Questions: What kind of experience have you had in your current job and how is it compatible to the system that we have in place?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online; filled everything out by hand (there was no "resume attachment" type of option). HR called within 24hours, telling me that they had a different position "that seemed would fit me better" available (applied for ER RN, got offered interview for ER observation unit RN position). The person I talked to on the phone was very pleasant and said she would schedule me for an interview and call me back - she did call back but didn't leave a message and I haven't heard back since - I didn't call her back myself so it seems we both dropped the ball. I expected that if they were interested they would have left a message asking me to call back or would have called back again at a later time. I also got an email later (couple weeks) stating that the job I had applied too was filled but that my application had be passed on to HR for other positions that matched my profile - that was an automated message, and I haven't received any contact from them since.

title: Front Desk Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (Marrero, LA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was called and the manager wanted me to come in within the next hour, which is very last minute and not convenient. I arrived at the clinic and was taken into one of the doctor's personal office. She asked basic interview questions and said that HR will determine my pay. You have to go to industrial medicine to complete your drug testing and physical. Orientation was the following week and took about an hour. They COO and CEO were present and gave presentations, which was very nice of them.

title: Administrative Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Quick process.  New within the week the job offer.
Interview Questions: General tell me about yourself but no other questions

title: Case Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (New Orleans, LA) in Sept 2012
Interview Descriptions: They called me in for an initial face to face interview and then approximately a week after that I received a call and had to schedule a second interview.  I received a call back approximately a week later with a job interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a strength and a weakness

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at West Jefferson Medical Center (Marrero, LA) in Jun 2010
Interview Descriptions: The process was quick . online app done .HR called the next day
